review: Faster than Roku, especially for Sling, but Amazon hasn't provided an answer as to why the set up says that it has insufficient power, even though it's plugged into a wall outlet. Amazon support just says everything I already know and have tried.
author: PLB "real world"

review: Love it.! I have 5 of them in my home.
author: Ralph Spadaccini

review: Exceeded my expectations in every way!  Thank you Amazon!
author: Jonathan Lippincott

review: We had the Fire Stick for a  while and we love it!
author: Mitzy Blue

review: Wonderful! I use it for amazon movies and Sling tv!
author: HW

review: Just an opportunity to purchase movies, we use Redbox.
author: Bob Satterly

review: I found the Fire TV Stick easy to set up and once connected I found that I could easily access Prime Videos, Music and many apps.  I have had it less than a week and I find that I mostly use it for Pandora although I have played around with some of the other features.  It sure beats having to watch/listen to Comcast all of the time!
author: jfd34

review: I'm enjoying it i don't feel board any more
author: Jonathan John

review: The stick is alright; the Amazon Prime content is awful. I hadn't done my homework so I was disappointed to find that most of the good old t.v. shows are on Hulu, which isn't free; also expecting TCM-like films, not much there either. Instead we get HBO profanity-laden content.At least I can watch Cheers  and Frazier reruns,at least
author: M. A. Rehak
